trans-unit.source: Defines a lifetime lease object that is used by the remoting lifetime service.
trans-unit.target: 定義遠端存留期 (Lifetime) 服務所使用的存留期使用期 (Lease) 物件。

trans-unit.source: Distributed garbage collection controls when server applications can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 在刪除伺服器應用程式時，分散式記憶體回收集合控制項。

trans-unit.source: Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control.
trans-unit.target: 傳統上，分散式記憶體回收會使用參考計數和控制的 ping。

trans-unit.source: This works well when there are a few clients per object, but does not work well when there are thousands of clients per each object.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於時有一些用戶端，每個物件，但有數千個用戶端，每一個物件時，也無法運作。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime service can assume the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and scales well when the number of clients increases.
trans-unit.target: 存留時間服務的用戶端數目增加時，也就可以假設傳統的分散式記憶體回收行程，與縮放比例的函式。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime service associates a lease with each remotely activated object.
trans-unit.target: 與每個遠端啟動物件存留期服務產生關聯的租用。

trans-unit.source: When the lease expires, the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: 當租用已到期時，則會移除物件。

trans-unit.source: A lease can specify that an object has an infinite lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 租用可以指定物件有無限的存留期。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.AppDomain> contains a lease manager that administers the leases in the domain.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.AppDomain>包含管理網域中的租用的租用管理員。

trans-unit.source: The lease manager periodically examines the leases for time expiration.
trans-unit.target: 租用管理員會定期檢查時間到期的租用。

trans-unit.source: If a lease has expired, it can either be canceled by removing its reference to the lease, or renewed by invoking one or more of the lease's sponsors.
trans-unit.target: 如果租用到期，它可以是取消藉由移除租用，其參考，或藉由叫用一或多個租用贊助者更新。

trans-unit.source: A lease contains properties that determine its policies, and methods that renew the lease time.
trans-unit.target: 租用包含可更新的租用時間，來決定其原則中，屬性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The lease exposes the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease> interface.
trans-unit.target: 會公開租用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease>介面。

trans-unit.source: For an example showing how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease> interface see [Lifetimes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/334a30e5-33cb-4f0f-a38a-ed4abc5560fa).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease>介面，請參閱[存留期](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/334a30e5-33cb-4f0f-a38a-ed4abc5560fa)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of time remaining on the lease.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用期上剩餘的時間數量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time remaining on the lease.
trans-unit.target: 使用期上剩餘的時間數量。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" /> of the lease.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用期的目前 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" /> of the lease.
trans-unit.target: 使用期的目前 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LeaseState" />。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial time for the lease.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用期的初始時間。

trans-unit.source: The initial time for the lease.
trans-unit.target: 使用期的初始時間。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.InitialLeaseTime%2A> property is set to <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the lease will never time out and the object associated with it will have an infinite lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.InitialLeaseTime%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>、 租用，將不會逾時時間，然後與它相關聯的物件會有無限的存留期。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Registers a sponsor for the lease.
trans-unit.target: 註冊使用期的贊助者。

trans-unit.source: The callback object of the sponsor.
trans-unit.target: 贊助者的回呼物件。

trans-unit.source: Registers a sponsor for the lease without renewing the lease.
trans-unit.target: 以不更新使用期的方式來註冊使用期的贊助者。

trans-unit.source: If a sponsor is registered with the current method, the lease is not renewed.
trans-unit.target: 如果贊助者已向目前的方法，是不會更新租用。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The callback object of the sponsor.
trans-unit.target: 贊助者的回呼物件。

trans-unit.source: The length of time to renew the lease by.
trans-unit.target: 使用期據以更新的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: Registers a sponsor for the lease, and renews it by the specified <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 註冊使用期的贊助者，並根據指定的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 更新它。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The length of time to renew the lease by.
trans-unit.target: 使用期據以更新的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: Renews a lease for the specified time.
trans-unit.target: 將使用期更新為指定時間。

trans-unit.source: The new expiration time of the lease.
trans-unit.target: 使用期的新到期時間。

trans-unit.source: The lease time is set to the maximum of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> or the current time plus the renewal time.
trans-unit.target: 租用時間設定的最大值為<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A>或目前的時間，加上更新時間。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time by which a call to the remote object renews the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間量，對遠端物件的呼叫將據此更新 <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time by which a call to the remote object renews the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 時間量，對遠端物件的呼叫將據此更新 <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime" />。

trans-unit.source: When you make a call to a remote object, the lifetime service adds the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A> to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> only if the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> has dropped below the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當您進行遠端物件的呼叫時，存留時間服務便會新增<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A>至<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A>才<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A>低於<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Sequential calls therefore do not increase the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> without bound.
trans-unit.target: 循序呼叫因此不會增加<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A>沒有繫結。

trans-unit.source: Instead, immediately after any call, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A> is guaranteed to be the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A> or longer.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，任何呼叫之後立即,<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.CurrentLeaseTime%2A>保證能夠<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.RenewOnCallTime%2A>或更長。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time to wait for a sponsor to return with a lease renewal time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定等候贊助者傳回使用期的更新時間所需時間數量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time to wait for a sponsor to return with a lease renewal time.
trans-unit.target: 等候贊助者傳回使用期的更新時間所需時間數量。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.SponsorshipTimeout%2A> is <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then this lease will not take sponsors.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease.SponsorshipTimeout%2A>是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>，則此租用會等到贊助者。

trans-unit.source: If a sponsor does not respond to a call to renew a lease within the time-out period, it is assumed to be dead and is removed from the list of sponsors for the current lease.
trans-unit.target: 如果贊助者的呼叫，以更新的租用逾時期間內沒有回應，它會假設為無作用，並從目前的租用的贊助者清單中移除。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The lease sponsor to unregister.
trans-unit.target: 要取消登錄的租用贊助者。

trans-unit.source: Removes a sponsor from the sponsor list.
trans-unit.target: 從贊助者清單中移除贊助者。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
